channel.title: Can't connect to my server?
channel.description:
Hi all.
I've got a server. Pretty much works. When I try to connect to myself using 0.0.0.0 or localhost it works 100%, but when I try to connect using my IP or my no-ip.org it says this:
In MoparScape: [CODE]Error connecting to server.[/CODE]
In the CMD: [CODE]ClientHandler: Accepted from Jesse.lan:1261 StarkosCape Server: Exception! java.net.SocketException: Connection reset at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:168) at client.fillInStream(client.java:265) at client.run(client.java:276) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:595) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected.[/CODE]
Please help me! Thanks a LOT!

item.title: Can't connect to my server?
item.dc:creator: @craz craz
item.description:
@craz wrote:

ok thanx so try connecting to my server then plz its online now and the name is koolscape.servegame.com or try the actual ip which is 172.202.177.43

if u get errors or if u can connect plz let me know !!! i need to know weather my server works for people or not !

Read full topic

item.title: Can't connect to my server?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

craz:

i got the same thing it says that my ip is 0.0.0.0 so i cant connect through my ip name how doi change it from 0.0.0.0 to my real ip address? plz plz plz tell me how this is the only thing i am stuck on !!vv

its supposed to do that, of course the server starts up on 0.0.0.0, which is your computer, if you cant connect from other computers to yours, that means that you have somthing blocking the server port, or you are using the wrong address, of course you know that 0.0.0.0 is not the ip address to try to connect to from other computer’s right?

Read full topic

item.title: Can't connect to my server?
item.dc:creator: @JBX JBX
item.description:
@JBX wrote:

Hi all.

I’ve got a server. Pretty much works. When I try to connect to myself using 0.0.0.0 or localhost it works 100%, but when I try to connect using my IP or my no-ip.org it says this:

In MoparScape:

Error connecting to server.

In the CMD:

ClientHandler: Accepted from Jesse.lan:1261 StarkosCape Server: Exception! java.net.SocketException: Connection reset at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:168) at client.fillInStream(client.java:265) at client.run(client.java:276) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:595) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected.

Please help me!
Thanks a LOT!

Read full topic
